pkgmetadata.longdescription: # piglatinConverts english text to piglatin.## Installation`piglatin` can be installed from PyPI using `pip`. pip install piglatin## Usage```python>>> import piglatin>>> piglatin.translate("hello world!")'ello-hay orld-way!'```## Command Line Usage`piglatin` can also be used as a command line tool.```bash $ python -m piglatin "hello world!"ello-hay orld-way```Or read and write to files.```bash$ python -m piglatin -i input.txt -o output.txt```
